ne24:2.2_0: “We practice the heart’s release by love, right thought, right speech, wrong action, these five faculties are always faculties.
ne24:2.3_0: “Peoplete right view is the noble eightfold path!”
ne24:2.5_0: For right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
